reapack.name: Smart Region Manager
reapack.desc: Manage region channel settings and batch export audio files

metadata.description:
# Smart Region Manager
A tool to manage region channel settings (Mono/Stereo) and export audio files with automatic channel configuration.
## Features - Custom window to manage all project regions - Per-region channel mode settings (Mono/Stereo) - Batch operations (select all, batch set channel mode) - One-click render with automatic channel settings - Optional naming suffix (_Mono, _Stereo) - Settings persistence in project file - Dark/Light theme support (matches REAPER theme)
## Requirements - REAPER 6.0+ (7.0+ recommended) - ReaImGui extension
## Usage 1. Run script from Actions menu 2. Set channel mode for each region 3. Select regions to export 4. Set output directory 5. Click "Render Selected"
